mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.activity_name AS "activityName", a.start_date AS "startDate", a.end_date AS "endDate", a.status AS "status", a.discount_rate AS "discountRate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.coupon_flag AS "couponFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activity_info( id, activity_name, start_date, end_date, status, discount_rate, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, coupon_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{activityName}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status}, #{discountRate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{couponFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE activity_info SET activity_name = #{activityName}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, status = #{status}, discount_rate = #{discountRate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, coupon_flag = #{couponFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
